root: ^You used to tell me about your dreams, about all the things you wanted to do. Do you still think about them, my child? What do you want for yourself now?

s: ^I still have dreams, Gran. I’m going to make them happen.
^Dreams are for people who’ve got time to waste.
^I don’t think about it much anymore, Gran.

dreamsQuest_Info: ^Reflecting on your dreams, you can choose to visit the **Community Center** or **Library** to foster your ambitions, increasing **EduStat**. Alternatively, visiting the **Gang Area** reflects a decision to stay in survival mode, increasing **GangStat**.
Making_Dreams_Happen: ^That’s the spirit. Dreams keep us going when everything else seems impossible. What’s your biggest dream now?

s: ^I want to get out of here, find a place where I can live without fear.
^I don’t know exactly, but I just want something better than this.

Live_Without_Fear: ^I understand. And you can do that. You’re smart, and with enough hard work, you can build a life outside these streets.
Something_Better: ^Better is good, but don’t stop there. Aim for something that makes you proud. What would that be?

s: ^Maybe a career, something that makes a difference.

Make_A_Difference: ^That’s a wonderful goal. You can do it if you keep your focus.
Figuring_It_Out: ^Take your time, but keep moving forward. You’ll find your path.
Dreams_Are_Waste: ^Time to waste? Dreams aren’t a waste of time. They’re what give you a purpose, something to strive for. What do you think happens when you stop dreaming?

s: ^I stop hoping for more. I just focus on surviving.
^I guess I stop caring about the future.

Focus_On_Surviving: ^Surviving is not enough. You’re worth more than just getting by. I don’t want to see you trapped in that cycle.
Stop_Caring: ^That’s dangerous, my child. If you stop caring about the future, it slips away from you. Don’t let it.
Not_Thinking_About_It: ^Why not? What’s stopped you from dreaming? Did something happen to make you lose faith in your future?

s: ^Things just feel too uncertain. I can’t plan for something that might not happen.
^Maybe I’ve just been focused on getting through the day.

Too_Uncertain: ^Life’s always uncertain, but if you don’t make a plan, someone else will make one for you. You need to take control.
Getting_Through_The_Day: ^Getting through the day is fine, but you need to keep one eye on tomorrow. You’re building something, whether you realize it or not.

s: ^I’ll try to start thinking more about my future.
^I’ll take it day by day for now.

Think_More_About_Future: ^Good. Focusing on the future will help you build a better life.
Day_By_Day: ^Take things at your own pace, but don’t lose sight of what’s ahead.

s: ^Visit the Community Center or Library to inspire your dreams.
^Go to the Gang Area to focus on survival.

Complete_Dreams_Quest_Success: ^You’ve chosen to nurture your dreams, seeking inspiration and a brighter future.
Complete_Dreams_Quest_Failure: ^You’ve chosen the path of survival, focusing on immediate needs rather than aspirations.
